title: From Retired Racers to Boardroom Brainiacs: How the Tour de France is Being Reshaped by Super CEOs
content:
Jeremy Whittle explores how a new breed of WorldTour bosses like Plugge, Zeeman, Brailsford pack transferable marketing and management acumen into a role once ruled by ex-riders.

Read the full article at From Retired Racers to Boardroom Brainiacs: How the Tour de France is Being Reshaped by Super CEOs on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
